name: Car smasher. Crush crazy cars!
description:
Crush all the cars and trucks that have gone crazy and want to destroy your city. But be careful with the ambulances, if you crush them you will lose a life.
Fun action game and reflexes, be the fastest and most accurate.

* Your mission is to prevent cars from entering the city, but respects the ambulances.
* The level of difficulty increases with time.
* Perform combos by crushing two or more cars at once.
* Slide your finger or click on cars to smash them.
* Fun effects, cars dash off and lose the wheels.
* The crazy cars do tricks, spins, rollovers and collide them alone.
* The game is free and has ads to support the developer.
